      • sendEmail

        public static boolean sendEmail(Mail objMail,
                                boolean bStore)
        Description : Simple version of sending a mail
        Parameters:
        Mail - : Mail Object with all respective values set
        boolean - : boolean value specifying whether the message needs to be stored in the TRACK_ADDR_MESS_MAP table
        Returns:
        boolean : Success / failure

      • sendEmail

        public static boolean sendEmail(Mail objMail,
                                java.util.Collection objCollection)
        Description : This function will be used for sending email to a collection of users.
        Parameters:
        Mail - : The Mail Object with text property specifying the placeholders
        Collection - : Collection of Users ( User Object), User names ( String)
        Returns:
        boolean : Success / failure

      • prepareEmail

        public static java.lang.String prepareEmail(Mail objMail,
                                            java.util.HashMap hm)
        Description : This function replaces all the occuranaces of the placeholders in the mentioned as keys in the HashMap
        Parameters:
        Mail - : The Mail Object with text property specifying the placeholders
        HashMap - : Key Value pair, where key - placeholder, value - the Actual value which should get replaced
        Returns:
        String : Email text with the placeholders replaced with the values from the HashMap

      • prepareEmail

        public static java.lang.String prepareEmail(Mail objMail,
                                            java.lang.Object obj)
        Description : This function identifies the class associated with each of the Object passed as a parameter. Using reflection, identify the class to which the Object. Using reflection, identify the properties of the Object, which will be specified as placeholders.
        Parameters:
        Mail - : The Mail Object with text property specifying the placeholders
        Object - : Object of any class
        Returns:
        String : Email text with the placeholders replaced with the values from the HashMap

      • translateEmail

        public static java.lang.String translateEmail(java.lang.String strText,
                                              java.lang.String siteId)
        Description : This function will use the dgmarket's, Translation Manager class to translate the TRN Tags specified in the Text being sent.
        Parameters:
        String - : email Text with placeholders specified with the TRN Tags
        Object - : Site Id which will be used by the TRN tags to replace the Keys
        Returns:
        String : Email text with the language specific Translation Text embedded into the input Text.

      • updateMessageStats

        public static boolean updateMessageStats(java.lang.String strText)
        Description : This function will decipher the mail id, User Id parameter and the Action performed on a URL sent with the message text. These values will be used to update TRACK_ADDR_MESS_MAP table, if found UNIQUE User Id c123456 - c- Create, 123 - MesssageId, 456 - UserId o123456 - o- Open, 123 - MesssageId, 456 - UserId This method might need to be synchornised.
        Parameters:
        String - : String to specify the c123456 parameter
        Returns:
        boolean : true/false

        public static int sendEmailMessages(java.util.Collection emailMessages,
                                    EmailProcessingCallback callback)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
